crew.name: Captain
crew.brief: The captain is the leader of the crew.
crew.description: The captain is the leader of the crew. They are responsible for the safety of the crew and the ship.

crew.name: First Mate
crew.brief: The first mate is the captain's right-hand person.
crew.description: The first mate is the captain's right-hand person. They are responsible for the crew when the captain is not around.

crew.name: Second Mate
crew.brief: The second mate is the captain's left-hand person.
crew.description: The second mate is the captain's left-hand person. They are responsible for the crew when the captain and first mate are not around.

crew.name: Boatswain
crew.brief: The boatswain is responsible for the ship's equipment.
crew.description: The boatswain is responsible for the ship's equipment. They are in charge of the crew's safety equipment.

crew.name: Carpenter
crew.brief: The carpenter is responsible for the ship's structure.
crew.description: The carpenter is responsible for the ship's structure. They are in charge of the ship's maintenance and repair.
